question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. tree
B. grey car
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The tree occupies the foreground with visible branches and leaves closest to the camera, while the grey car is further back on the road, clearly positioned behind the tree.
